about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Dedicated to protecting your digital privacy
about.description: We are a team focused on network security and privacy protection. Since 2020, we have been committed to providing secure, fast, and reliable VPN services to users worldwide. We believe everyone has the right to enjoy a free and secure internet.

pricing.title: Pricing Plans
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that suits you

q1.question: What is a VPN?
q1.answer: A VPN (Virtual Private Network) is an encrypted network connection that protects your online privacy and security.

q2.question: How do I get started?
q2.answer: After signing up, download our application, log in, and you're ready to go.

q3.question: Which devices are supported?
q3.answer: We support major platforms including Windows, Mac, iOS, and Android.

q4.question: How many devices can I connect simultaneously?
q4.answer: Depending on your plan, you can connect 3-10 devices simultaneously.

q5.question: Is there a money-back guarantee?
q5.answer: Yes, we offer a 7-30 day money-back guarantee depending on your chosen plan.

q6.question: How can I contact support?
q6.answer: You can reach our 24/7 support team via email, live chat, or ticket system.
